data.meta_site_name: Lottie Mae Williams Obituary | May 14, 2019 | Dunn, NC
data.text:
Mrs. Lottie Mae Williams, 85, of 1751 Wellons Drive, Fayetteville, passed away May 14, 2019.

The family will be receiving friends at the home of Mr. & Mrs. Willie Jefferson, 301 Turlington Drive, Benson.

Survivors: children - Mary Brinkley of Richmond, VA, Annette Anderson (Willie) of Greenville, Perry Williams of Raleigh, Darlene Anderson (Elliott) and Patrick Williams (Rosa) both of Fayetteville, Michelle Jefferson (Willie) of Benson and Melissa Williams, a granddaughter she raised as a daughter; seventeen grandchildren, thirty-two great grandchildren, and four great great grandchildren; a host of first cousins, niece, nephews, other relatives and friends.

The viewing will be held on Thursday, May 16, 2019 at the Dafford Funeral Home, Dunn from 3:00 pm - 5:00 pm.

The funeral service will be conducted on Friday, May 17, 2019 at 1:00 pm at the Dafford Funeral Home Chapel, Dunn.

The burial will follow in the Resthaven Cemetery, Dunn.
